column3: See Note 7 for details of restructuring and other charges (income). Amounts for the years ended 2013, 2012 and 2011 relate to FMC Agricultural Solutions of $32.6 million, $8.5 million and $1.2 million; FMC Health and Nutrition of $1.0 million, $0.7 million and $1.5 million; FMC Minerals of $6.4 million, $13.0 million and $0.7 million; and Corporate of $7.9 million, $5.3 million and $2.9 million, respectively.
